mainHero.subtitle: 100% undetectable.
mainHero.description: Craft personalized cover letters and cold emails effortlessly. AI-powered analysis matches your resume to job descriptions, delivering customized cover letters. Stand out from the competition with CoverHelper.

items.title: Seamless resume and job description matching
items.description: Add your resume and a job description, CoverHelper's advanced AI analyzes and extracts key details, ensuring seamless alignment between your cover letter and specific job requirements.

items.title: Maximizing impact through multiple channels
items.description: Cover all bases by allowing you to effortlessly create compelling cold emails and attention-grabbing LinkedIn messages. Just choose your avenue of communication, we'll handle the rest.

items.title: Impactful time saving efficiency
items.description: With AI-assisted workflows, you can streamline the writing process. CoverHelper's AI helps you structure your content effectively and allowing you to focus on showcasing your unique qualifications.

items.name: Wow, making cover letters has never been easier. Allowed me to apply and stand out to so many jobs, already have interviews lined up!
CoverHelper is a must-have tool for every job seeker. With CoverHelper, I felt confident in my applications, and it paid off - I received multiple job interviews!
As someone who struggled with writing compelling cover letters, CoverHelper was a game-changer.
With CoverHelper I was able to create tailored LinkedIn messages that made me get noticed from recruiters.

sections.name: Something
sections.content: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.
